data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Hong-Xing, Yang, Lin, Chen, Xiang-Sheng (2019): Taxonomic study of the genus Malaxa Melichar, with descriptions of two new species from China (Hemiptera, Fulgoroidea, Delphacidae). ZooKeys 861: 43-52, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.861.32777, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.861.32777
